thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1843
thread.title: dd

author: dd
title: dd
text:
i find flight hub's website more clear and easier to use than many others.
Like that cost in canada dollars can be selected. Nothing worse than finding a desired flight (originating in canada) but not know that it was really in US$ until the payment screen is displayed.
Also like absence of popups claiming to find a lower price if one chats or phones. They just waste your time, start by offering a higher price, dont bother reading what you ask for, and then try to claim what you found was really in US$. I wont name the site that just did that to me but then I went back to flight hub and booked without "friction"
